use test;

show tables;
0 rows returned
--create topic testtopic;
use test0;
0 rows returned
create source test_source_0(
    col0 bigint,
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (meta("key").k0)
);
0 rows returned
--load data dataset_0;
create materialized view test_mv_0 as select * from test_source_0;
0 rows returned
show tables;
|table|
|test_mv_0|
|test_source_0|

) with (

    topicname = "testtopic",
